link.description:
This chapter focuses on providing in-depth tutorials using the Bitloops Language.
    
    These tutorials are comprehensive lessons on how to build specific functions, microservices or applications using the
    Bitloops Language. We provide you with a detailed, step-by-step instructions of how to complete a particular project. 
    
    Throughout these tutorials we provide insights into key software development principles, patterns and methodologies
    that are industry best practices when write code and creating software, and is therefore best suited for lessÂ´
    experienced software engineers. Senior, more experienced, software engineers can still benefit from these tutorials, 
    and can use the How-to Guides to find answers to their questions more quickly.
